attributes.review: First this app took forever to download and when it finally did, it crashed. Tried it again. Crashed. Rest the phone. Crashed. Turned off my phone and plugged it in. Then it wouldn’t turn on. I had to go to the apple store to fix my phone! And when it turned back on the app was gone? I was so confused. So I went to bed and I was awoken by a loud sound and I saw it was coming from my phone. I checked the time and it was at exactly 3:00am. Spooky. I looked and the app was open on my phone. It asked for my phone number so I put it in, thinking nothing of it. Then random numbers started calling me. And if I picked up no one would answer and it would hang up. And now every night at 3:00am a number calls me that looks like 666-666-6666 and if I pick up I hear breathing for a few seconds and then it hangs up. I’m just gonna go buy a new phone...
attributes.title: THIS APP BROKE MY PHONE!

attributes.review: Absolutely do not recommend. Downloading this almost made me have a seizure🥺 Trump, I am very disappointed in you buddy. You tried to kill off people using Corona and now you’re using an app? That’s not very nice of you. Smdh. I give this app a -10000 out of 10.
